00036 void QuadCurveFitUtility::addPoints( cv::Point2f _inputSet )
00037 {
00038     m_dataPoints.push_back(_inputSet);
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 
00043 /*
00044   y = ax^2 + bx + c
00045 
00046   notation Sjk to mean the sum of x_i^j*y_i^k.
00047   2a*S40 + 2c*S20 + 2b*S30 - 2*S21 = 0
00048   2b*S20 + 2a*S30 + 2c*S10 - 2*S11 = 0
00049   2a*S20 + 2c*S00 + 2b*S10 - 2*S01 = 0
00050 
00051   solve the system of simultaneous equations using Cramer's law
00052 
00053   [ S40  S30  S20 ] [ a ]   [ S21 ]
00054   [ S30  S20  S10 ] [ b ] = [ S11 ]
00055   [ S20  S10  S00 ] [ c ]   [ S01 ]
00056 
00057   D = [ S40  S30  S20 ]
00058       [ S30  S20  S10 ]
00059       [ S20  S10  S00 ]
00060 
00061       S40(S20*S00 - S10*S10) - S30(S30*S00 - S10*S20) + S20(S30*S10 - S20*S20)
00062 
00063  Da = [ S21  S30  S20 ]
00064       [ S11  S20  S10 ]
00065       [ S01  S10  S00 ]
00066 
00067       S21(S20*S00 - S10*S10) - S11(S30*S00 - S10*S20) + S01(S30*S10 - S20*S20)
00068 
00069  Db = [ S40  S21  S20 ]
00070       [ S30  S11  S10 ]
00071       [ S20  S01  S00 ]
00072 
00073       S40(S11*S00 - S01*S10) - S30(S21*S00 - S01*S20) + S20(S21*S10 - S11*S20)
00074 
00075  Dc = [ S40  S30  S21 ]
00076       [ S30  S20  S11 ]
00077       [ S20  S10  S01 ]
00078 
00079       S40(S20*S01 - S10*S11) - S30(S30*S01 - S10*S21) + S20(S30*S11 - S20*S21)
00080 
00081  */
00082 
00083 
00091 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getATerm()
00092 {
00093     if( m_dataPoints.size() < MIN_VALUES )
00094     {
00095         std::cout<<"Atleast 3 data sets required to interpolate" ;
00096         return 0;
00097     }
00098 
00099     // notation sjk to mean the sum of x_i^j_i^k.
00100     double s40 = getSxy( 4, 0 );
00101     double s30 = getSxy( 3, 0 );
00102     double s20 = getSxy( 2, 0 );
00103     double s10 = getSxy( 1, 0 );
00104     double s00 = (double)m_dataPoints.size();
00105 
00106     double s21 = getSxy( 2, 1 );
00107     double s11 = getSxy( 1, 1 );
00108     double s01 = getSxy( 0, 1 );
00109 
00110     // Da / D
00111     m_a = (s21 * (s20 * s00 - s10 * s10) - s11 * (s30 * s00 - s10 * s20) + s01 * (s30 * s10 - s20 * s20))
00112                 /
00113                 (s40 * (s20 * s00 - s10 * s10) - s30 * (s30 * s00 - s10 * s20) + s20 * (s30 * s10 - s20 * s20));
00114 
00115     return m_a;
00116 }
00117 
00125 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getBTerm()
00126 {
00127     if( m_dataPoints.size() < MIN_VALUES )
00128     {
00129         std::cout<<"Atleast 3 data sets required to interpolate" ;
00130         return 0;
00131     }
00132 
00133 
00134     // notation sjk to mean the sum of x_i^j_i^k.
00135     double s40 = getSxy( 4, 0 );
00136     double s30 = getSxy( 3, 0 );
00137     double s20 = getSxy( 2, 0 );
00138     double s10 = getSxy( 1, 0 );
00139     double s00 = (double)m_dataPoints.size();
00140 
00141     double s21 = getSxy( 2, 1 );
00142     double s11 = getSxy( 1, 1 );
00143     double s01 = getSxy( 0, 1 );
00144 
00145     //   Db / D
00146     m_b = (s40 * (s11 * s00 - s01 * s10) - s30 * (s21 * s00 - s01 * s20) + s20 * (s21 * s10 - s11 * s20))
00147         /
00148         (s40 * (s20 * s00 - s10 * s10) - s30 * (s30 * s00 - s10 * s20) + s20 * (s30 * s10 - s20 * s20));
00149 
00150     return m_b;
00151 }
00152 
00160 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getCTerm()
00161 {
00162     if( m_dataPoints.size() < MIN_VALUES )
00163     {
00164         std::cout<<"Atleast 3 data sets required to interpolate" ;
00165         return 0;
00166     }
00167 
00168 
00169     // notation sjk to mean the sum of x_i^j_i^k.
00170     double s40 = getSxy( 4, 0 );
00171     double s30 = getSxy( 3, 0 );
00172     double s20 = getSxy( 2, 0 );
00173     double s10 = getSxy( 1, 0 );
00174     double s00 = (double)m_dataPoints.size();
00175 
00176     double s21 = getSxy( 2, 1 );
00177     double s11 = getSxy( 1, 1 );
00178     double s01 = getSxy( 0, 1 );
00179 
00180     //   Dc / D
00181     m_c = (s40*(s20 * s01 - s10 * s11) - s30*(s30 * s01 - s10 * s21) + s20*(s30 * s11 - s20 * s21))
00182             /
00183             (s40 * (s20 * s00 - s10 * s10) - s30 * (s30 * s00 - s10 * s20) + s20 * (s30 * s10 - s20 * s20));
00184 
00185     return m_c;
00186 }
00187 
00195 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getRSquare()
00196 {
00197     if( m_dataPoints.size() < MIN_VALUES )
00198     {
00199         std::cout<<"Atleast 3 data sets required to interpolate" ;
00200         return 0;
00201     }
00202 
00203     return (1.0 - getSSerr() / getSStot());
00204 
00205 }

00219 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getSxy( int _nX, int _nY )
00220 {
00221     double dSxy = 0.0;
00222 
00223     for(int i = 0;i<m_dataPoints.size();i++)
00224     {
00225         dSxy += pow(m_dataPoints[i].x,_nX) * pow(m_dataPoints[i].y,_nY);
00226     }
00227 
00228     return dSxy;
00229 }
00230 
00238 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getYMean()
00239 {
00240     double dTotal = 0.0;
00241     int nCount = 0;
00242     for(int i = 0;i<m_dataPoints.size();i++)
00243     {
00244         dTotal += m_dataPoints[i].y;
00245         nCount++;
00246     }
00247 
00248     return dTotal / nCount;
00249 }
00250 
00258 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getSStot()
00259 {
00260     double ssTot = 0.0;
00261     double dYMean = getYMean();
00262 
00263     for(int i = 0;i<m_dataPoints.size();i++)
00264     {
00265         ssTot += pow( (m_dataPoints[i].y * dYMean), 2 );
00266     }
00267 
00268     return ssTot;
00269 }
00270 
00278 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getSSerr()
00279 {
00280     double ssErr = 0.0;
00281 
00282     //auto pThis = this;
00283 
00284     for(int i = 0;i<m_dataPoints.size();i++)
00285     {
00286         ssErr += pow( (m_dataPoints[i].y - getPredictedY( m_dataPoints[i].x)), 2 );
00287     }
00288 
00289     return ssErr;
00290 }
00291 
00301 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getPredictedY( double _x )
00302 {
00303     return (getATerm() * pow( _x, 2 )) + (getBTerm() * _x) + getCTerm();
00304 }
00305 
00306 double QuadCurveFitUtility::getDifferential( double _x )
00307 {
00308     //2at + b is the differential
00309     return ((2 * getATerm() *  _x) + (getBTerm()));
00310 }

00312 void QuadCurveFitUtility::processPoints()
00313 {
00314     int i = m_dataPoints.size();
00315 
00316     //std::sort(m_dataPoints)
00317     std::cout<<"size is:"<<i<<"first:"<<m_dataPoints[0].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[0].y<<"last:"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].y<<"\n";
00318     double temp = 0;
00319     if(i != 0)
00320     {
00321         temp = m_dataPoints[0].x;
00322         while(temp < m_dataPoints[i - 1].x)
00323         {
00324             std::cout<<" Interpol. X and Y are: "<<temp<<":"<<getPredictedY(temp);
00325             m_dataPointsAfterInterpol.push_back(cv::Point2f(temp,getPredictedY(temp)));
00326             temp = temp + 0.01;
00327         }
00328     }
00329 }

00332 void QuadCurveFitUtility::processParametricPoints(std::vector<float>& _inputBuffer)
00333 {
00334     int i = m_dataPoints.size();
00335 
00336     //std::sort(m_dataPoints)
00337     std::cout<<"size is:"<<i<<"first:"<<m_dataPoints[0].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[0].y<<"last:"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].y<<"\n";
00338     double temp = 0;
00339     if(i != 0)
00340     {
00341         temp = m_dataPoints[0].x;
00342         while(temp <= 1.0)
00343         {
00344             std::cout<<" Interpol. X and Y are: "<<temp<<":"<<getPredictedY(temp);
00345             //m_dataPointsAfterInterpol.push_back(cv::Point2f(temp,getPredictedY(temp)));
00346 
00347             _inputBuffer.push_back(getPredictedY(temp));
00348             temp = temp + 0.01;
00349         }
00350     }
00351 }

00353 void QuadCurveFitUtility::processParametricPoints3D(std::vector<float>& _inputBuffer,float& o_coeffX)
00354 {
00355     int i = m_dataPoints.size();
00356 
00357     //std::sort(m_dataPoints)
00358     std::cout<<"size is:"<<i<<"first:"<<m_dataPoints[0].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[0].y<<"last:"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].x<<"::"<<m_dataPoints[i - 1].y<<"\n";
00359     double temp = 0;
00360     if(i != 0)
00361     {
00362         temp = m_dataPoints[0].x;
00363         while(temp <= 1.0)
00364         {
00365             std::cout<<" Interpol. X and Y are: "<<temp<<":"<<getPredictedY(temp);
00366             //m_dataPointsAfterInterpol.push_back(cv::Point2f(temp,getPredictedY(temp)));
00367 
00368             float tempValue = getPredictedY(temp);
00369             if(!(std::isnan(tempValue)))
00370             {
00371                 _inputBuffer.push_back(getPredictedY(temp));
00372             }
00373             temp = temp + 0.01;
00374         }
00375 
00376         // get the differential at t = 1.0 which will be our
00377         // tangent to the impact point
00378         o_coeffX = getDifferential(1.0);
00379 
00380     }
00381 }
